discovery.notes: Comprehensive discovery from rich input set. Key decisions resolved: dual location, 'we' voice, subtle playfulness.

audience.notes: Light ICP based on portfolio analysis. Primary: Brand Builder (lifestyle/CPG marketers). Secondary: Agency Producer.

architecture.notes: 5-page portfolio-first architecture. Pages: Home, Work, Work Detail (CMS), About, Services, Contact.

design.notes: Design direction synthesized from DVTK, Gym Class, Larra Studio, Tristan Bagot references. Sophisticated minimalism with bold typography. Off-white primary with dark hero option.

review.notes: Score: 8.4/10. Ready with minor fixes. 0 critical, 3 high, 5 medium, 4 low issues. Key gaps: testimonials, homepage clarity, FAQ page.

copy.notes: All page copy written: Homepage, Work, Work Detail, About, Services, Contact. Voice matched to 'Talented Friend' archetype. Testimonial placeholders flagged.

overall.next_action: Ready for /project handoff or Webflow implementation
